recipe.title: Green Olive and Coriander Relish
ingredients: a 9 1/2-ounce jar green olives (about 2 cups), rinsed and pitted
pita loaves, cut into wedges, as an accompaniment
instructions: In a food processor grind coarse the coriander seeds, add the olives, the vinegar, and the oil, and blend the mixture until the olives are chopped fine. Let the relish stand, covered and chilled, overnight. The relish may be made 3 days in advance and kept covered and chilled. Serve the relish at room temperature with pita wedges.
